```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(maptools)
library(geojsonio)
```




```{r}
dc1 <- geojson_read("C:/Users/tmo/Downloads/Neighborhood_Clusters.geojson", what="sp")
dc_map1 <- fortify(dc1)
dc_map1 <- merge(dc_map1, dc1, by.x="id", by.y="row.names")

download.file("http://opendata.dc.gov/datasets/c4b0cd43d50949e98e57de9f22b455fc_35.geojson", tf <- tempfile(fileext=".geojson"))

map_nb <- geojson_read(tf, what="sp")
map_nb <- fortify(geojson_read(tf, what="sp"))
```

```{r}

ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(data=dc_map1, aes(x=long, y=lat, group=id), fill="white", col="black")
```
